title: 158: Tantra Talk with Kamali Minter (recorded June 10, 2019)
itunes:title: 158: Tantra Talk with Kamali Minter (recorded June 10, 2019)
description:
*EPISODE ORIGINALLY DROPPED ON JUNE 10, 2019 
The Broads sit down with the amazing love/intimacy educator & tantric relationship coach, Kamali Minter. They discuss tantra, its deeper meaning, meditation practices for orgasm, transformation of self and sensuality, and much more.
You can follow Kamali at @wearespaceforlove or @kamaliminter and find out more about her workshops and blog at www.spaceforlove.com (http://www.spaceforlove.com/)
Books that Kamali discussed: 
“Tantric Orgasm for Women” by Diana Richardson
“Come As You Are” by Emily Nagoski 
“The Way of the Superior Man” by David Deida

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
